NeoPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
OLED12864_I2C:
makecode I2C OLED 128x64 Package.
From microbit/micropython Chinese community.
OLED12864_I2C.hline|param|len: is the length of line, eg: 10
OLED12864_I2C.invert|param|d: true: invert / false: normal, eg: true
OLED12864_I2C.showNumber|param|num: is the number will be show, eg: 123
OLED12864_I2C.showString|param|s: is the text will be show, eg: 'Hi!'
OLED12864_I2C.vline|param|len: is the length of line, eg: 10
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.clear:
Turn off all leds.
you need to call `  display ` visible to make changes.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.length: Gets the number of pixels declared on the stripe
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.rotate:
Rotate the LED forward.
you need to call `  display ` visible to make changes.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.rotate|param|offset: 向前旋转的像素数, eg: 1
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the stripe. This flag applies only to future operations.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.setPin: Set the pin for the strip connection, default to P0.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.shift:
Move the LED forward and clear with zero.
you need to call `  display ` visible to make changes.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.shift|param|offset: 向前移动的像素数, eg: 1
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.show: Send all changes to the ribbon.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.showColor: Displays all leds of a given color (r, g, b range 0-255).
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.showRainbow: Display rainbow patterns on all leds.
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.showRainbow|param|end: 彩虹的结束色调值, eg: 360
anxinRGBLeds.Strip.showRainbow|param|sta: 彩虹的起始色调值, eg: 1
anxinRGBLeds.colors: Gets the RGB value of a given color
anxinRGBLeds.hsl: Converts the hue saturation value to an RGB color
anxinRGBLeds.rgb: Convert red, green, and blue channels to RGB colors
anxinSegPac:
安芯教育图形包.

安芯教育图形块
anxinSegPac.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to TM1637, with given bit
anxinSegPac.TM1637LEDs.intensity: Set the nixie tube brightness, the range is [0-8], 0 indicates off.
anxinSegPac.TM1637LEDs.off: Turn off the nixie tube LED.
anxinSegPac.TM1637LEDs.showbit: Displays the number in the specified location.
ntcPac.Temperature: Convert NTC ADC data to temperature
